text: The Union for Future Benin () is an electoral alliance in Benin. In the legislative elections held on 30 March 2003, the party was member of the Presidential Movement, the alliance of supporters of Mathieu Kérékou, who had won the 2001 presidential elections, and won 31 out of 83 seats. The most important of the member parties are the Action Front for Renewal and Development (Front d'action pour le rénouveau et le développement) and the Social Democratic Party (Parti Social-Démocrate). Category:Political party alliances in Benin
title: Union for Future Benin
